title.rendered: Top 8 Healthcare Software Development Companies To Outsource Your Project

content.rendered:
In the healthcare industry, technology is the key to success. Healthcare software development companies are innovators in this field, providing solutions that help hospitals and other medical entities meet their goals.

Actually, technology is expanding its clutches very fast and affecting every vertical in the healthcare industry. From healthcare apps to telemedicine, the evolution of every healthcare service is the boon of technology. Now patients are getting faster and cutting edge treatment, better diagnostics with minimal-invasive procedures.

All of these are happening due to improved software applications and advanced technology integration. So, you must be wondering what the tech-savvy leaders and healthcare solution providers are.

In this article, we would take a glance at top healthcare software development companies that are helping business enthusiasts to secure cutting-edge software solutions.

So Let’s start:

I have prepared this list by considering reviews and ratings about companies on different tech forums such as Clutch, Goodfirms, and more. Altogether, I have taken the following aspects into consideration.

  • Awards & recognition received
  • Quality of Assistance
  • Developer hourly price
  • Industry-Expertise
  • Credibility & Communication

Let’s take a glance at top healthcare software development companies.

1. PixelCrayons

PixelCrayons stands out as one of the top choices when it comes to outsourcing healthcare software development projects. With over two decades of experience since its inception in 2004, PixelCrayons has garnered recognition as a leading digital consulting and engineering firm based in India. Their clientele spans across 38+ countries, serving a diverse range of enterprises, ISVs, digital agencies, and startups.

The company’s mission revolves around providing customer-centric, result-oriented, and cost-competitive IT and software solutions. They prioritize agility and adherence to SLAs, ensuring on-time project delivery—a crucial aspect in the healthcare sector where timely solutions can make a significant impact.

PixelCrayons envisions itself as a globally recognized software consulting and development company dedicated to serving ISVs, agencies, SMEs, and enterprises. Their commitment to constant innovation drives their quest for excellence, making them a reliable partner for healthcare software development needs.

Founded: 2004

Headquarters: Noida, India

Clutch Rating: 4.9/5

Hourly Price: Starting from $12-30/hr

Celebrated Clients: Vodafone, Puma, eBay, HP, Next, Blacks, Kraft foods, DEBENHAMS, BOLS, Qatar Airways

Why Choose?

  • Web/mobile app development
  • SaaS-based software products
  • Ready-made solutions
  • Dedicated development teams
  • Cutting-edge solutions tailored solutions

2. invertio

invertio is a well-known IT outsourcing company that caters to top-notch solutions to a variety of industries, including healthcare, real-estate, media, and education. The company has successfully launched 4000+ projects to 2500+ global clientele.

Being a top provider of innovative software solutions, the company has earned a huge name in terms of healthcare app development. It is engaged in innovating healthcare solutions with the latest technologies like AI/ML, AR/VR, Blockchain, IoT, and more. Due to unbeatable innovation at the core, the company has been recognized by Red Herring, Deloitte, and NASSCOM.

It follows the FTR approach and guarantees innovation with a team of highly motivated designers, developers, and IT experts. With a team of more than 500+ experts at the headquarters, the company also enables remote IT assistance to businesses of a variety of areas. If you are looking for a reliable healthcare software development agency, connect with invertio.

Founded: 2004

Headquarters: Gurugram, India

Clutch Rating: 5.0/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $15/hour

Celebrated Clients: Estel, Capgemini, EventDo, Grundfos, Novea, SelectSpecs, Track Opinion, Candor, BlueLane, RiskLogic, Dubai Police, Rina, The Mueller Healthcare Foundation, Tekion, Affle, ZenQ, UNESCO

Why Choose?

  • Understand Business Needs
  • Your Ideas Are Safe
  • Highly Creative & Motivated
  • First Time Right Process
  • Innovation Is Guaranteed

3. Glorium Technologies

If you are looking for a trusted healthcare software development company that can understand your business environment and the need for modern patients, then you must connect with Glorium Technologies. The company’s major agenda is to serve the best mobile and web applications to healthcare and education organizations.

It also built an app solution for Covid-19 relief that simulates the training. Being a top provider of healthcare solutions, it has served healthcare brands and received huge appreciation. They believe in helping both startups and mid-size organizations to push market growth.

With strategic planning and technical expertise, they transform vision into a digital solution that not just evolves the healthcare industry but also benefits patients. If you are looking for a healthcare software development company that can develop a sophisticated and user-centric healthcare solution.

Founded: 2010

Headquarters: Princeton, NJ

Clutch Rating: 4.7/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour

Celebrated Clients: RealPage, CAE, BIOMODEX, m.Doc, Vitalware, Astarte Medical, Agfa HealthCare, Control.IT, FUEL, Speechagain, PACS Harmony, Doxy.me, Project Ipsilon, BBMK Technologies, Medlab, (Re)meter, and more.

Why Choose?

  • Customized Parameters
  • Third-party Integrations
  • Improved Decision making
  • Flexible Application Development
  • Improved Operational

4. Sidebench

Only its name is side bench, but it is the best place to think about innovation and business transformation. The company is known for proliferating innovation and infusing award-winning strategies into the design and development of the enterprise-grade solution.

Bringing strategic value to businesses by catering to best-in-class user experience, the company is engaged in boosting research and innovation in the field of system architecture, UX-first approach, product design, and more.

That’s the major cause behind its recognition in America’s 5000 fastest-growing companies.

Moreover, it has been recognized by Forbes 30 Under 30 and has been American Hospital Association’s Innovation Challenge Winner. Being a top provider of custom healthcare software development services, the company is trusted for incredible client assistance. So, you must reach out to it.

Founded: 2012

Headquarters: Santa Monica, CA

Clutch Rating: 4.9/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $150/hour

Celebrated Clients: Legendary Entertainment, Pabst Blue Ribbon, Oakley, Lightspeed Ventures, Pressed Juicery, Accel Partners, Children’s Hospital Los Angeles, United Talent Agency, Los Angeles County, UCSF Clinical Innovation Center, American Heart Association, Cedars-Sinai, and more.

Why Choose?

  • Multidisciplinary Teams
  • Engaging Activities & WorkShop
  • Strategic Approach
  • Project Discoveries
  • Decisive Design Strategies

5. Yalantis

It is one of the best software providers in Ukraine, with an unmatched understanding of the needs of modern businesses. They build custom software that aids businesses to boost productivity, customer engagement and gain competitive advantages such as revenue & value to customers.

In the space of software application development, its digital transformation strategies and product improvement approach enable its clients to increase operational efficiency and expand in a new market. Moreover, the company’s expertise lies in Cybersecurity, IoT, Cloud, DevOps, Big Data, Analytics, and more.

Moreover, it is excelling in SaaS development, Mobile Software products. Healthcare mobile app development, and more. The major domains it serves are Logistics, Fintech, telecommunications, Real Estate.

Founded: 2008

Headquarters: Dnipropetrovs’k, Ukraine

Clutch Rating: 4.8/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour

Celebrated Clients: KPMG, Zillow, Healthfully, and more.

Why Choose?

  • Complete Business Audits
  • Solutions With Architectural Vision
  • Value Within Aggressive Deadline
  • Modular System Development Approach
  • Adjust Your Business Processes

6. One tree

One tree prides in being one of the top consulting companies and technology providers. It is rendering its services in more than ten countries by evolving experience & knowledge in software development, UI/UX design, and business tech strategies.

The organization admires the challenges that can help it have evolved exposure into business needs and tech integration. The company guarantees to work with your team and bring unmatched capabilities to the table. It has already developed an app that monitors the side effects in cancer patients.

From creating wireframes to icons, the company is also known for its incredible design work. That’s the reason the program interface designed by Ontree has always been appreciated for mind-blowing aesthetics. If you are looking for sophisticated and best-in-class healthcare app development services, connect with One tree.

Founded: 2009

Headquarters: Montevideo, Uruguay

Clutch Rating: 4.8/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour

Celebrated Clients: University of Michigan, Medable, Kuru Footwear, Careangel, Acumenian, Harvard University, Stanford University, Visual Vault, Del Terruño, Mosca, Fivisa, Precisión

Why Choose?

  • Timely Project Delivery
  • Innovative & Motivated Teams
  • Non Disclosure Agreements
  • Top-Notch Software Quality

7. Concise Software

It specializes in creating hardware-integrated applications for industries like Healthcare, Supply Chain, and more. The expertise of companies in intelligence hardware devices & IoT is incredible: that’s the reason it has been appreciated for healthcare application development.

The company has an incredible team of specialists, consultants, and developers that work together to leave a remarkable impact in the industry. It helps businesses throughout healthcare application development including, planning, design, software engineering, and deploying.

Moreover, its expertise lies in cloud infrastructure and can create solutions from scratch. Altogether, it specializes in dApps, Blockchain application development, Connected Vehicles, IoT user experience, and more.

Founded: 2011

Headquarters: Berlin, Germany

Clutch Rating: 4.7/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour

Celebrated Clients: Red Bull, Ars Electronica, Panasonic, Ubitricity, Delivery Hero

Why Choose?

  • Align With Changing Trends
  • Ideation & MVP Development
  • Non-Disclosure Agreements
  • Timely Delivery
  • Better Communication & Innovation

8. 10Clouds

10Cloud is a team of expert developers and designers eager to expand their tech know-how and transform digital ideas into impressive products. It serves great potential to both small and medium-sized businesses. Altogether, its teams have excellent expertise in Python, machine learning, DevOps, MLOps, and more.

Since its initiation, the company is engaged in helping businesses to scale their technology ecosystem by offering top-class staff augmentation. They understand evolving business needs and create the highest-performing solutions.

Not just that, its work has also been featured in The Economist, TechCrunch, Wired, The New York Times, and others. So, if you are striving to find an excellent partner to secure desired healthcare app development services, you must reach out to them once.

Founded: 2009

Headquarters: Warszawa, Poland

Clutch Rating: 4.9/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $50/hour

Celebrated Clients: Conquista, Asmodee, Baidu, Forbes, StepStone, TrustStamp, Skedulo, Swile, and more.

Why Choose?

  • Meet Product Vision
  • Flexible & Tailor-made Solution
  • Uncover Business Values
  • Dependable Prototypes
  • Timely Delivery

Also Read: Why Investing in Healthcare App Development is Good?

9. Highland

The company ranks in the list of best custom healthcare software development services providers due to its innovation-centric approach and excellent technical expertise. Being a mission-driven organization, the company believes in catering solutions that stand out in the market.

It has created and successfully launched 268 digital products and transformed forbidden ideas into reality. When it comes to healthcare software development, it has served a number of healthcare brands that have evolved quality of assistance.

Moreover, the team at Highland has the aptitude to understand diverse business ideas and current market trends. That’s the reason they are trusted for catering innovative solutions.

Founded: 1999

Headquarters: Chicago, IL

Clutch Rating: 4.9/5.0

Hourly Price: Starting from $150/h

Celebrated Clients: Cigna, Agiliti Health, Children’s Hospital of Wisconsin, Harvard University Health Services, Creative Group, Greif, McGraw-Hill, RefugeeOne.

Why Choose?

  • Research & Innovation
  • Methods That Truly Delivers
  • Tech That Empowers Businesses
  • On-time Product Delivery
  • Standard Quality & Strategy

Also Read: A Complete Guide For Healthcare App Development

Wrapping Up

Given are top healthcare software development companies in the world that can refurbish your healthcare business for more value and revenue. You can pick any of these depending on comfortable aspects like cost, location, or quality of services.

Either you can look online for other companies, however, reaching out to any of them can save you a lot of time. Moreover, it is recommended to gauge the expertise of the company and pick the one that fits your expectations.

I hope the article helps you pick the best healthcare software development company. If you want to add any other company to the list, let me know in the comments.
